prompt: Create a modern search results page with a clean white background featuring a search bar at the top with a magnifying glass icon and placeholder text 'Search for products...'. Below the search bar, display a results counter showing '245 results found' in gray text. The main content area should contain a vertical list of search result cards, each with a rounded rectangular border, light gray background, and containing a product image placeholder (100x100 pixels) on the left, followed by product details including a bold product title, price in green text, star rating with yellow stars, and a short description in gray text. Include a 'View Details' button in blue for each result card. Add proper spacing between elements and ensure the layout is scrollable.
